mapper.sql: id, name, display_name, type, creator_id, description, file_count, vector_collection_name, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM tb_knowledge_base WHERE type = 'PUBLIC' OR (type = 'PERSONAL' AND creator_id = #{userId}) ORDER BY type ASC, create_time DESC

SELECT FROM tb_knowledge_base WHERE (type = 'PUBLIC' OR (type = 'PERSONAL' AND creator_id = #{userId})) AND (display_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) ORDER BY type ASC, create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_knowledge_base SET file_count = file_count + #{increment}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{knowledgeBaseId}

UPDATE tb_knowledge_base kb SET file_count = ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_knowledge_base_file kbf WHERE kbf.knowledge_base_id = kb.id ), update_time = NOW() WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tb_knowledge_base_file kbf WHERE kbf.knowledge_base_id = kb.id )
